body_html: Yes, our optimizers, including AdamOptimizer, use tf.Variable instead of tf.get_variable, so they will not allow to share Adam variables like this. I don't know if we want to correct this in all optimizers, or find other workaround?
body_text: Yes, our optimizers, including AdamOptimizer, use tf.Variable instead of tf.get_variable, so they will not allow to share Adam variables like this. I don't know if we want to correct this in all optimizers, or find other workaround?
body: Yes, our optimizers, including AdamOptimizer, use tf.Variable instead of tf.get_variable, so they will not allow to share Adam variables like this. I don't know if we want to correct this in all optimizers, or find other workaround?
